casebody.data:
COSTELLO, Appellant, v. NEW YORK, O. & W. RY. CO., Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by Ellen Costello, as administratrix, etc., against the New York, Ontario & Western Railway Company.

Argued before HARDIN, P. J., and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
